title: Establishes the New York state tax on dry cask storage fund directing certain nuclear generating facilities to transfer certain monies in exchange for the storage of
summary: Establishes the New York state tax on dry cask storage fund directing certain nuclear generating facilities to transfer certain monies in exchange for the storage of dry casks containing spent fuel.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, in relation to establishing the New York state tax on the dry cask storage fund and to direct certain nuclear generating facilities to transfer certain monies in exchange for the storage of dry casks containing spent fuel
